SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(COUNT(oi.id), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN pay_record oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
